original_text: Perhaps you might go to a town where the people do not accept you. They will not listen to you. So you should leave that town. Clean that town's dirt off your feet. Then it will be clear that they have done something wrong.’
korean_text: 어느 곳에서든지 너희를 영접하지 아니하고 너희 말을 듣지도 아니하거든 거기서 나갈 때에 발 아래 먼지를 떨어버려 그들에게 증거를 삼으라 하시니

sentences.original_text: Perhaps you might go to a town
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 당신은 마을에 갈 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: where the people do not accept you
They will not listen to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신의 말을 듣지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So you should leave that town
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 그 마을을 떠나야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Clean that town's dirt off your feet
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 발에서 그 마을의 먼지를 털어내세요

sentences.original_text: that they have done something wrong
